channel.title: How to Rename/Add Bonuses to an item
channel.description: ok well, im starting a server thats based mostly on skillers, merchers, and pure pking, now with all this, i want to make some Rings, i want to make a Ring Called "Pvp Ring" and it gives 70+ str, and i wanna make like Onyx Ring called "Looting Ring" and it gives a load of def bonus. Also, i want to make a Santa an extremely rare item, and make it have 200+ str bonus. Can someone tell me how to add item Bonuses and Rename items. Thanks. if you can only answer one, then dont reply cause i want to know both at the same time. again, thanks, hopefully you can help.

item.title: How to Rename/Add Bonuses to an item
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

orcashark:

i want to rename a ring already made, and what do i do once in im item.cfg??

Well, you will see a lot of these:

item = 2677	Attack_cape	Its a Attack_cape	99000	99000	99000	0	0	0	0	0	9	9	9	9	9	0	0

The first three numbes are “Low alching, shop price, high alching”, the numbers after that are the bonuses. Idk which bonusess are which so you’ll have to play around with it, but thats the basics. And the names you just change like so:

item = 2677	FUCKING_AWESOME_cape	Its a fucking_awesome_cape	99000	99000	99000	0	0	0	0	0	9	9	9	9	9	0	0

hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: How to Rename/Add Bonuses to an item

item.title: How to Rename/Add Bonuses to an item
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

orcashark:

ok well, im starting a server thats based mostly on skillers, merchers, and pure pking, now with all this, i want to make some Rings, i want to make a Ring Called “Pvp Ring” and it gives 70+ str, and i wanna make like Onyx Ring called “Looting Ring” and it gives a load of def bonus. Also, i want to make a Santa an extremely rare item, and make it have 200+ str bonus. Can someone tell me how to add item Bonuses and Rename items. Thanks. if you can only answer one, then dont reply cause i want to know both at the same time. again, thanks, hopefully you can help.

If you want to make a ring, are you going to MAKE it or are you wanting to change the name of a ring already added and add the bonuses you want to it? And for changing names/bonuses go to item.cfg in your config file server-side

Read full topic
